game.name: Lapistasia
game.shortDescription: Understand in 3 minutes, addicted for 100 hours! Your board is your engine. Lapistasia merges block puzzles with roguelike deckbuilding. Craft ultimate synergies with relics to trigger explosive chain reactions. Break the rules and build the perfect combo. Can you hit 1,000,000+ damage?
